name: Potato Chowder
comments: This is a tasty way to use up a lot of milk that might go bad soon
instructions: In large pot combine all but last three ingredients. Cook about 15 minutes or until vegetables are tender.
Heat 4 1/2 c. milk in saucepan and whisk in butter and flour. Add to pot with vegetables, along with remaining 1 1/2 c. milk. Simmer for 15 minutes and serve.
